answer:

• Bits beings sent one at a time
• Bits being sent over a single wire
• Data can be sent to and from the web server/network component/computers …

question: Give two benefits of serial half-duplex.
answer:
Any two from:
• Bits will not be skewed // Bits are sent in order
• Less chance of error
• Less crosstalk/interference
• Data can be sent over a long distance (if needed)
• It is possible to download and upload data to the web server
• Higher bandwidth than full duplex

question: Give one drawback of serial half-duplex.
answer:
Any one from:
• The transmission of data may be relatively slow
• Data cannot be sent and received at the same time
• May be more data collisions

question: Describe how web pages are located, retrieved and displayed.
answer:
Any six from:
• The users type the URL into the address bar/web browser
• The web browser sends the URL to the DNS
• The DNS searches for the matching IP address
• The DNS returns the IP address to the web browser
• If the DNS cannot find the IP address it sends the URL to the next DNS
• The web browser sends a request to the IP address/web server
• The web server sends the data for the web page to the web browser
• The web browser renders the HTML data to display the web page
